name: Premium Laptop
description: High performance laptop with 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, Intel i7 processor, suitable for development, design, and productivity tasks. Comes with long battery life and high-resolution display.

name: Wireless Headphones
description: Noise-cancelling over-ear headphones with long battery life, immersive sound quality, Bluetooth 5.2 support, and comfortable ear cushions for extended use.

name: Smart Watch
description: Advanced smartwatch with heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, fitness tracking, GPS, and real-time notifications. Waterproof and compatible with iOS and Android.

name: Mechanical Keyboard
description: High-quality mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB lighting, tactile key switches, ergonomic design, and durable build quality suitable for gaming and coding.

name: Wireless Mouse
description: Ergonomic wireless mouse designed for comfort, precision, and long working sessions. Features adjustable DPI, silent clicks, and rechargeable battery.

name: 4K Monitor
description: Ultra HD 4K monitor offering crystal-clear visuals, wide color accuracy, high refresh rate, and smooth performance. Ideal for gaming, design, and professional work.
